Benefit debt repayments

BETA This is a new service â€“ your feedback will help us to improve it.

Before you start

Only use this service to repay what you owe in full.

If you make a part payment using this service the Department for Work and Pensions may still try to recover the money through a debt collection agency or by taking it directly from your wages or benefits.

Contact DWP Debt Management on 0345 850 0293 to discuss your options if you can't repay in full.
